episodes.title: Born From the First Breath
episodes.desc: Brahma’s breath gives form to Saraswati—speech becoming the world’s first word.

episodes.title: I Am the Queen (Vāk Sūkta)
episodes.desc: Speech introduces herself; Saraswati as the voice behind all voices.

episodes.title: River of Thunder
episodes.desc: Saraswati as mighty river-goddess who clears obstacles and brings victory.

episodes.title: Invisible Third at the Confluence
episodes.desc: Where Ganga and Yamuna meet, tradition says Saraswati flows invisibly.

episodes.title: Pushkar and the Curse
episodes.desc: Brahma’s sacrifice, Gayatri’s arrival, and Savitri’s fateful curse.

episodes.title: Kalidasa’s Blessing
episodes.desc: The mocked youth touched by Saraswati becomes the poet Kalidasa.

episodes.title: Throne of Wisdom
episodes.desc: Śāradā Peeth and the Sarvajña Pīṭha—trial of knowledge and purity.

episodes.title: Veena Across the Sea
episodes.desc: Saraswati journeys as Benzaiten—eloquence and music in Japan.

episodes.title: First Letters on Rice
episodes.desc: Vidyārambham/Aksharabhyāsa—the alphabet as an offering to the goddess.

episodes.title: Following a Vanished River
episodes.desc: Balarama’s pilgrimage along Saraswati’s course—river and word as one.

episodes.title: Co-Wives of the Cosmos
episodes.desc: Fluid Puranic tellings of Saraswati with Brahma, Vishnu, and Ganga.

episodes.title: The Swan that Chooses Clarity
episodes.desc: Hamsa as viveka—the power to discern the pure note in the noise.
